title: How to Wait in Fallout 4 on Playstation 4, Xbox One, and Windows

steps.title: Find a chair.
steps.content: Find a chair. Unlike other Bethesda games, you can only wait in Fallout 4 if you've got a chair to sit in. You can use a chair you find in the overworld, or you can craft your own chair. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sit down, and select how long you want to wait.
steps.content: Sit down, and select how long you want to wait. Once you sit, the game will give you a prompt if you want to wait a certain amount of time. [2] X Research source

steps.title: There are a number of chairs to craft in the workshop.
steps.content: There are a number of chairs to craft in the workshop. Below are some of the chairs you can craft : [3] X Research source Armchair: 3 Cloth and 5 Wood will make an Antique Armchair. Other armchairs are available as well (though all of them use Cloth and Wood, with the exception of the Wide Armchair using Steel as well). Barber Chair: 1 Plastic and 4 Wood Dining Chair: 1 Steel and 4 Wood Folding Chair: 4 Steel Kitchen Chair: 2 Cloth and 2 Steel will make a Kitchen Chair. Other chairs are available as well (all of them use Cloth and Steel, though some also use Plastic). Modern Chair: 4 Cloth and 4 Steel Office Chair: 4 Leather and 4 Steel
